attributes.action: equal state pension for all pensioners in line with the living wage
attributes.additional_details: because when a pensioner has reached retirement and it seems they are now forgotten even though they pay all the bills same as someone on a living wage
attributes.background: pay all pensioners who have paid into society for the last 50 years a living wage

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you are concerned about the level of the state pension, but we're not sure exactly how you'd like this to be increased.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Support the pension triple lock: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/591161

Increase State Pensions to £400 a week and fund free adult social care for all: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/584971

Increase the state pension by £5,000 a year: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/595241
